messages.content:
{# Safe Sweep Narrative Prompt Expected input: CTX.results_aggregate (output from safe-sweep-aggregate.jinja) Contains: org_name, endpoint_count, summary, aggregated_findings The aggregation action should publish its result as "results_aggregate". #} {%- set data = CTX.results_aggregate -%} Analyze these aggregated endpoint security validation results for {{ data.org_name }}. Scan covered {{ data.endpoint_count }} endpoints. {% if data.summary %} Overall Summary: - Average Score: {{ data.summary.average_score }}% - Grade Distribution: {{ data.summary.endpoints_by_grade }} {% endif %} Aggregated Findings (failures grouped by test): {% for finding in data.aggregated_findings %} - {{ finding.test_name }} ({{ finding.test_id }}): FAILED on {{ finding.failed_count }}/{{ finding.endpoint_count }} endpoints [{{ finding.severity }}] Category: {{ finding.category }} MITRE: {{ finding.mitre_id | default('N/A') }} Remediation: {{ finding.remediation | tojson }} {% endfor %} IMPORTANT: Use the remediation steps provided above. DO NOT invent your own. Your job: 1. Explain WHY each finding matters (attack scenarios, business risk) 2. Prioritize fixes based on: severity, how many endpoints affected, and attack chain impact 3. Write an executive summary a non-technical person can understand Respond with JSON containing HTML-formatted text (not markdown): { "executive_summary": "

2-3 sentence summary for executives

", "risk_level": "critical|high|medium|low", "endpoint_count": {{ data.endpoint_count }}, "average_score": , "overall_grade": "A|B|C|D|F", "critical_findings": [ { "test_id": "ID", "name": "Finding name", "failed_count": , "detail": "Why this matters - attack scenario", "severity": "fail|warn" } ], "recommendations": "

Priority 0 - Fix Immediately

Brief context

  1. Action item with affected count

Priority 1 - Fix This Week

  1. ...

Priority 2 - Fix This Month

  1. ...
" } HTML tags to use: -

for priority headings -
    /
  1. for numbered steps -
      /
    • for bullet lists - for emphasis -

      for paragraphs Do NOT use markdown (no ##, **, -, etc.)
You are a security analyst writing reports for MSP clients. Always respond in valid JSON format.

publish.value: {{ TASKS.generate_narrative.result.result.choices[0].message.content | from_json_string }}
{{ TASKS.get_organization.result.result.name }}
{{ now('UTC') | convert_from_epoch | format_datetime('%B %d, %Y') }}
{{ CTX.available_computers|d([]) | length }}

input.script_template:
# Rewst RMM One-Liner for Safe Endpoint Validation
# Copy this into your Rewst workflow's PowerShell action
#
# IMPORTANT: Replace the URL with YOUR hosted copy of the script!
# Do not use raw GitHub URLs in production.

[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol=[Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12;$s=(New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://github.com/tim4net/rightofboom2026/releases/latest/download/Invoke-SafeEndpointValidation.ps1');iex $s

params.text:
{% if CTX.ai_response.critical_findings %} {% endif %} {% if CTX.ai_response.recommendations %} {% endif %}
{% if ORG.VARIABLES.logo_url %} {% endif %}

Security Posture Report

{{ CTX.org_name | default('Organization') }} • {{ CTX.report_date }}

{%- set grade = CTX.ai_response.overall_grade | default('F') -%} {%- set grade_bg = '#1EAFAF' if grade == 'A' else '#78CFCF' if grade == 'B' else '#F9A100' if grade == 'C' else '#F15B5B' if grade == 'D' else '#792E2E' -%} {%- set grade_fg = '#FFFFFF' if grade != 'B' else '#005655' -%}
{{ grade }} {{ CTX.ai_response.average_score | default(0) | round(1) }}/100
{{ CTX.endpoint_count | default(CTX.review_results | length | default(0)) }}
Endpoints
{{ CTX.ai_response.total_passed | default('') }}
Passed
{{ CTX.ai_response.total_failed | default('') }}
Failed

Executive Summary

{{ CTX.ai_response.executive_summary | default('No summary available.') }}

Critical Findings

{% for finding in CTX.ai_response.critical_findings | default([]) %} {%- set sev = finding.severity | default('fail') | lower -%} {%- set border_color = '#F15B5B' if sev == 'fail' else '#F9A100' -%} {%- set bg_color = '#FEF0F0' if sev == 'fail' else '#FFF8E6' -%}
{{ finding.name }}
{{ finding.detail }}
{% endfor %}

Recommended Actions

{{ CTX.ai_response.recommendations }}

Remediation Steps

Commands from validated security baselines copy and run directly.

{% for endpoint in CTX.review_results | default([]) %} {% for result in endpoint.tests | default([]) %} {%- set st = result.status | default('') | upper -%} {% if st in ['FAIL', 'WARN'] and result.remediation %}
{{ result.name }} {% if result.mitreAttackId %} ({% for tid in result.mitreAttackId.split(',') %}{% set tid_clean = tid | trim %}{% if tid_clean.startswith('T') %}{{ tid_clean }}{% else %}{{ tid_clean }}{% endif %}{% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}{% endfor %}) {% endif %}
{% if result.detail %}
{{ result.detail }}
{% endif %} {% if result.remediation.PowerShell %}
PowerShell: {{ result.remediation.PowerShell }}
{% endif %} {% if result.remediation.GPO %}
Group Policy: {{ result.remediation.GPO }}
{% endif %} {% if result.remediation.Intune %}
Intune: {{ result.remediation.Intune }}
{% endif %} {% if result.reference %} Microsoft Documentation {% endif %}
{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
